content: Hi! I'm staying in Utrecht for 4 months, anybody here?
I'll be arriving in Utrecht in 6 months...
There's a Lean crowd in Amsterdam and in Leiden. But I'm not aware of much activity in Utrecht (yet).

I'm currently at the VU Amsterdam but I studied in Utrecht and still live close by. It might be nice to meet up sometime soon! The CS department has some people interested in formal verification, for example Wouter Swierstra was a supervisor for my Master's thesis.
I've touched down in NL. I'll be starting at the UU math dept in September.
